msg: Correct the writePrevious() method to go only one level up (to our parent tag),
rather than all the way up to the page writer.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a new <bean:size> tag that will store the size of an array,
Collection, or Map into a page-scope bean with type java.lang.Integer.
